subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Stanley Cup champion Anaheim signed the free-agent defenseman Shane Hnidy to a two-year contract worth $1.5 million. Hnidy, 31, had five goals and seven assists in 72 games for Atlanta last season.
snippet: Stanley Cup champion Anaheim signed the free-agent defenseman Shane Hnidy to a two-year contract worth $1.5 million. Hnidy, 31, had five goals and seven assists in 72 games for Atlanta last season.
